locations: Los Angeles, California, USA::(University of Southern California)
imdb.plot outline: Exploring the behind the scenes processes of the Film and Television industries, specifically in regards to the below the line positions that really allow a film or television show to be made. This includes grips, camera Assistants, make-up artists, prop-masters, the wardrobe team, and almost every other credit you see during the credit roll at the end of a film. If you're looking to learn a little more about how the industry works, the types of positions that exist on a set, or even just watch some cool behind the scenes footage with some real LA based filmmakers, this is the show for you.
imdb.title: Below the Line
plot: A weekly 30-minute show exploring the behind the scenes processes of the Film and Television industries, specifically in regards to the below the line positions that really allow a film or television show to be made.

Exploring the behind the scenes processes of the Film and Television industries, specifically in regards to the below the line positions that really allow a film or television show to be made. This includes grips, camera Assistants, make-up artists, prop-masters, the wardrobe team, and almost every other credit you see during the credit roll at the end of a film. If you're looking to learn a little more about how the industry works, the types of positions that exist on a set, or even just watch some cool behind the scenes footage with some real LA based filmmakers, this is the show for you.
